page.title: 02EDUCATION.
page.content: The only school to be found in this study area is that in{Rhuallt}village. It is a two-teacher school with a pupil population of 19.This is made up of 11 juniors,7 infants and 1 nursery child.{(Figures correct at 17/5/85). Of those children,9 live in Rhuallt and 10 live in the outlying areas,to the west and east, within 3km of the school.They are transported to school by minibus.12 families send children to the school. The present staff is made up of a teaching headmaster(Juniors), a female teacher(Infant/Nursery dept), and a secretary(Fridays only).There is a female caretaker and a dining-room assistant (Both reside in the village) The headmaster is resident in Prestayn while the Infant teacher resides in Pentre Halkyn,to the south of Holywell The secretary resides in Rhyl.
